content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (status: NO_POWER; research: automation; electrical id: 2488).
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator
Consists of:
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_system: [7676]; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5)).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING; fluid_system: [7676]).
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7676 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7677 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7678 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7683 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7682 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7687 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7686 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY)
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7689 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY)
- Electricity Network provided via ElectricityGroup with id=2488.

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Failures:
  - Repeated attempts using varying fluid_system IDs (7332, 7375, 7418, 7461, 7504, 7547, 7590, 7633) to supply water to the steam engine have consistently failed.
  - Tip: Confirm the available PipeGroup status and use the validated working fluid_system (7676) directly when establishing water connections.

• Pipeline Connection and Stabilization Delays:
  - Consistent 10-second stabilization waits following each connection attempt have not resolved the issue due to incorrect fluid_system references.
  - Tip: Once a working pipe group is identified, utilize its fluid_system reference without cycling through alternative IDs.

• Persistent Steam Engine Integration Issues:
  - The steam engine remains NOT_CONNECTED with continuous warnings about missing power network links and water input.
  - Tip: Verify the integration between the steam engine, the pipeline network, and the active electricity network ensuring proper water supply and correct entity alignment.
